resources.string:
Rules 
 1- When you start playing you will get 2 seconds to view the pieces. You must then press the play button to start the game. 

 2- There are two pictures of each animal which you shall correctly pick out.

3- When you click the first image you must click another. If those are the same they will both stay visible, else they will return to blank.

 4- You will win when you have matched all the images correctly.

 5- Time is important in this game. The highscore is based on time and the shorter amount of time used, the better the score.
